'''Mattis 'BomuBoi' Grahm''' is the second artist hired by [[Mojang Studios|Mojang Studios]] to work on ''[[Mojang Studios#Caller's Bane|Caller's Bane]]''.

== Trivia ==
* The name of the old ''Pocket Edition'' crafting system, [[Crafting/Before Pocket Edition v0.9.0 alpha|MATTIS]], was a reference to him.<ref>[[Talk:Mattis Grahm]] &mdash; [[Jens Bergensten]], August 5, 2012. "Just a FYI, it should be "Mattis", not "Mattias". You're missing out on the reference to MATTIS (Pocket Edition)." </ref>
